title: What is the best brand of computers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Among affordable (not Apple) the best is DELL. No other brand I tried gave me such reliability: DELL laptops (have couple of them) run for 3+ years without any single problem. I can’t give such compliment to Acer, Lenovo and especially (the worst) ASUS. Had Lenovo 2 times - serves from 1 to 3 years without malfunctions, ASUS - from 2 weeks (usb ports failure) to 3 months (dead), had one Acer - 3 years then dead. But DELL never let me down (even if it’s budget laptops).

the one that best suits your needs. It could be anything from a Raspberry PI to a Cray supercomputer (though many may argue that is not a PC) Dell is consistent - Lenovo is IBM offshoot and sometimes has problems.
